name: getlocal
description: Local Corner Store Pickup Platform - connecting customers with independent corner stores for product ordering and in-store pickup

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
